reviews.review:
After a huge amount of consideration taken into account I am finally here to tell you that this game might as-well be called  LGBTQ hang out it was pretty bad on console but its even worse on PC I mean I cant walk 2 meters without seeing a big shiny gay pride charm on a hook (Because I really care about your sexuality while trying to avoid getting massacred by a psychopathic clown with a human finger collection) and the majority of streamers who play this game looks like girls....but there boys its strange its almost like the idea of sadism and endless torture just make them to flock to this game like flies when they see sh11t (Which is exactly how id sum them up when they see anything they can make political tbh) I mean bro I stg one time one of my random team mates and the killer was talking about how there both bisexual in end game chat and how much they both F##k there partner (Like bro did slaughtering survivors turn you on so much you gotta start a convo about that on DBD lmao) 

Anyway this game used to be good way when I played on console but like the killers are just boring and pushed out cus there running out of ideas, everything went down hill when they changed the graphics and the animations (its looks so goofy now) still a fun game tho so imma recommend
this game is absolute fucking dog shit lmao.
Great game! One of my favorites!
es como la coca, es mala pero necesaria
they should add fortnite dances to this game
i really enjoy the game even if i'm playing alone.

Great game with good support from Devs, they are always trying to improve the game. A lot of characters come free to play and you are able to earn premium currency, by leveling up, to purchase new characters. Game is definitely challenging but plenty of opportunity to learn how to play better and survive through youtube videos.
es un buen juego tiene muchos asesinos y la variabilidad de mapas esta buena
the game is fun but the community is more toxic than chernobyl and the devs are so out of touch with the community that you would think they are making a different game
Pretty fun game to hop and play for a few and hop off.  There's no real commitment.

This is a very fun game, you run away from a killer, the killers are from movies and etc. My brother and a friend had it before I ended up getting it, it is a cross platform game. Fun for many people, you can make friends and if you have friends who already play the game you can invite them to your lobby.

I enjoy it quite so. I love getting pulled off the hook where the killer is 3 m away and then I get swung at the second my feet touch the ground. I would not change it for the world.

Fav game, worth the money, recommend it to everyone.. even tho theres toxic people, u can find many nice people to play with<3

DBD is a very addicting game. You won't even notice that you're not having fun at times!

In all seriousness, the game has its flaws- but what application doesn't. Overall, it is a fun game.

Pumped 250+ hours into this game in about 6 months.
Best multiplayer game I've played in years though. Can easily spend a few hours a day with friends on this game just running different perk builds and having fun.
Basically only downside is toxic/ ability abusing to suck the fun out of some matches, but that depends on the individual player(s) you are up against. As long as you don't let this get to you, you can have a ton of fun with this game.

Written by: Average Boon Enjoyer

This game is really good for gamer that can think logic, because u need to think when u play killer and survivor when u want to loop
But on the other side, there are many bugs and cheater in this game.
And dont forget the camper and tunnler, but when u can loop as an survivor, than u can handle tunnler and camper.

Literally one word: MMR, the absolute braindead decision to implement such a thing to a HYPER casual game at its core like dbd is truly astounding. Its really not about "constructive criticism" anymore, sugar coating it does nothing as we have seen time and time again. Yes theres been good changes over the years but so many core issues still remain. You give your fans what they want or you f*ck off, you do your job or you (should) lose it. The game is sweatier then fortnite even during non-prime time the second your MMR gets high enough. It just isnt enjoyable long term. Youll end up playing a bit when a new chapter drops until you inevitabely drop it for another few months again and repeat the cycle. Oh yeah they are also woke virtue signalers putting things like a pride flag on hooks and around wastes of survivors in a f*cking survival horror game, like... LMFAO. "Yeah we care about representing everyone", bull f*ckin sh*t. The game will bait you in with big licenses just to drive you away due to their willingful and stubborn incompetance and the result of those things. You arent "saving your hard work" by keeping MMR in, youre just showing how out of touch your work is with the actual community, and how even more out of touch you are to stubbornly insist it stays into the game despite literally everyone telling you that youre wrong, hurting you even more in the long run, and those dropping player counts only prove it more. The game deserves to continue declining until you fix your sh*t, because we all know the "we know better then the fans" mentality has worked so well for companies like EA in the past. Then the same horrible mentality from two companies gets the same reaction, who wouldve guessed.
